# Exercism

Please replace 'exercise name' with the actual exercise name. To use exercism on bash on ubuntu on windows (ubunutu) ensure that your current directory is within the C or D drive. On Mac, exercises will be downloaded to your home directory(`~/Exercism`).

```bash
exercism download --exercise=<exercise name> --track=javascript
```

Once the Exercism problem has been downloaded you must install the module that you will use to facilitate the test cases. Run:

```bash
npm install
```

After completing the business logic for the Exercism problem, please run:

```bash
npm test
```

After you have solved the problems and passed all the test, run the `submit` command to submit your code. In this case, the file is called `hello-world.js` make sure you are in the directory that the file is in then run:

```bash
exercism submit hello-world.js
```

Let’s finish and submit the solution for the first toy-problem of JavaScript!

```bash
# Change Directory by using real physical path
# Don't copy the following line
cd /mnt/c/exercism/javascript/hello-world
# This line works
exercism submit hello-world.js
```
